name: The Fishman Group
overview:
The Fishman Group is recognized as one of Israelâ€™s largest and most renowned private investment groups. It is primarily involved with investments in Real estate, Retail, Media and Telecommunications. The Fishman Group has diversified holdings in Israel and abroad and owns some of the major companies in numerous fields.

Scope of activities The Groupâ€™s business holdings are highly diversified, reflecting a pragmatic and flexible approach to business opportunities. Its interests cover both public and private companies. Its holdings extend to full ownership in some companies versus partnership in others. It is involved in a spectrum of activities from specialized high-tech niches to large-scale retailing

A synergy of skills The principal building blocks of the Fishman Group approach is the success in blending diverse business skills, diverse operational experience and financial expertise according to the project in hand. From evaluation to execution, managers within the Group work as an integrated team, sharing expertise and initiatives in order to assure the greatest commercial success for every venture undertaken.
